row.text: Eligitur. Append. adl Ragenini Gesta Frid. imp. 1168 in MG. SS. XX. 425. „a Ro- manis praeter Centios Iohannes Albanensis abbas eligitur et Calixtus III. nuncupatur“. Annal. Ceccanenses 1168 in MG. SS. XIX. 286: „pars eius (Paschalis III.) elegit electum de Albanis in papam Calixtum“. Cf. Bosonis card. Vita Alexandri III. ap. Watterich II. 411, Annal. Coloniens. max. 1168 in MG. SS. XVII. 782, ed. Waitz p. 120, Chron. de Mailros ap. Fell R. A. SS. p. 170, ed. Stevenson p. 81.
